comment.author: 53688253@N08
comment._content: Think it maybe Coogee beach with the Palace in the background.

comment.author: 92723869@N07
comment._content: Most definitely Coogee! The  domed Palace Aquarium & Baths was opened in December 1887. In 1954 a storm caused the collapse of the dome and it was rebuilt only in 1987 and converted to restaurants & bars.
